name: Bun Shami Kebab
description: A flavorful and traditional shami kebab patty, made with minced meat and lentils, seasoned with aromatic spices, tucked inside a soft bun. A perfect savory snack.

name: Chicken Cheese Burger
description: A classic favorite! A juicy grilled or fried chicken patty topped with a slice of melted cheese, crisp lettuce, fresh tomato, and creamy sauce, all nestled in a soft burger bun.

name: Chicken Grill Burger
description: A healthier yet delicious option featuring a perfectly grilled, tender chicken breast, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and a light tangy sauce, served in a toasted burger bun.

name: Chicken Spicy Burger
description: For those who crave a kick! A crispy, spicy chicken fillet, zesty sauce, fresh lettuce, and perhaps a slice of pepper jack cheese, all packed into a soft burger bun.

name: Jalapeno Burger
description: Turn up the heat with this fiery delight! A juicy beef or chicken patty topped with spicy jalape√±o slices, melted cheese (often pepper jack), and a zesty chipotle mayo in a fresh bun.

name: Plain Chicken Burger
description: A simple and satisfying burger featuring a seasoned chicken patty served in a soft bun. Perfect for customizing with your favorite toppings and sauces, or enjoying as is.

name: Sausage Burger
description: A unique and flavorful burger experience! A savory sausage patty, often complemented with cheese, grilled onions, and a tangy mustard or BBQ sauce, served in a fresh burger bun.
